name: Welcome to Hell!
debriefing: Congratulations! You indeed can drive a tank already.~~Now, please allow a few words on #whow you can flush your tank.#r You will obtain coins for tanks and cannons you have killed. In the workshop you can use those coins to buy something interesting.~~However, you can't just buy everything you want in the workshop. Our genius scientists must researched the new technologies before new weapon can be bought. That requires stars #S.~~So, shall we go to the body shop to get more shells?
briefing: Despite the name, this is the first, most humane level in the game. Your mission is to find the flag on the map, and, if you wish so, you don't even have to kill anyone here.~~Shall we get going?
